info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 4:03PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western New Madrid and southeastern Stoddard Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 403 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Glennonville to near Rector. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bernie around 415 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Parma, Gideon, Canalou and Risco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southeastern Missouri.
